history.proof: unfold CV_radius. hauto lq: on use: Lub_Rbar_correct, CV_disk_0 unfold: is_lub_Rbar, is_ub_Rbar.

exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R Unable to unify "match ?M2363 ?M2365 with | Finite x => match Finite 0 with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Finite 0 with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "match proj1_sig (ex_lub_Rbar (fun r : R => ex_series (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n * r ^ n)))) with | Finite y => 0 <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end".

In environment a : nat -> R Unable to unify "match Lim_seq ?M2363 with | Finite x => match Lim_seq ?M2364 with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match Lim_seq ?M2364 with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "match proj1_sig (ex_lub_Rbar (fun r : R => ex_series (fun n : nat => Rabs (a n * r ^ n)))) with | Finite y => 0 <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end".

original: unfold CV_radius. unfold Lub_Rbar, CV_disk. apply is_sup_seq_major with (l := 0). apply Lim_seq_le_loc. intros n. destruct n. - unfold CV_series. apply Rbar_le_refl. - apply is_ub_Rbar_forall_R, ex_series_lim_0. intros k. unfold Rbar_le. apply Rle_refl.
